data.title: HTML
data.description: HTML is the standard markup language for creating Web pages. Even if HTML is not a programming language, it is the squeleton of a webpage. It is a well underrated language. A lot of tags have usefull attributes that can be used to make a website more accessible or are just unknown.

data.title: CSS
data.description: CSS is the language used to style the HTML elements. It is a powerfull language with a lot of properties. CSS in 2024 is lot more powerfull than before. A lot of Javascript can be replaced by CSS today.

data.title: JavaScript
data.description: JavaScript is a programming language that is used to make a website interactive. It is the only language that can be executed in the browser. It is a language that is evolving quickly. I personnally only use Typescript, a super set of Javascript for more robust code.

data.title: React
data.description: React is a library to build user interfaces. It is a powerfull library that is used by a lot of companies. It is a library that is easy to learn but hard to master. React is my main framework.

data.title: Nodejs
data.description: Node.js is a runtime environment that allows to run Javascript outside of the browser. It is used to build server side applications. It is a powerfull tool that can be used to build a lot of things. The event loop is a powerfull principle that can be used to easily resolve in a better way some develpement problems.

data.title: Tailwind
data.description: Tailwind is my main CSS framework.

data.title: Typescript
data.description: Typescript is a super set of Javascript. It is a language that is more robust than Javascript. Building types makes team work easier. I always use Typescript in my project.

data.title: SolidJs
data.description: Solidjs is a declarative Javascript library for building user interfaces like React. It uses signal driven states instead of a virtual dom. SolidJs is a very performant way to build very interactive web application. If your application need a fast javascript framework, SolidJs is the way to go.

data.title: PHP
data.description: PHP is my first web language. It is a language that is easy to learn and that is very powerfull. 80% of websites on the web are powered by PHP. Laravel or Symfony are known fullstack frameworks that let you build very complex application with all the features you need.

data.title: NextJs
data.description: Next is my main React framework server side. I worked with Next in my last job.

data.title: SQL
data.description: Sql is mature and reliable. I build a lot of blogs with SQL and Doctrine ORM.

data.title: Docker
data.description: Docker is a tool designed to make it easier to create, deploy, and run applications by using containers. Containers allow a developer to package up an application with all of the parts it needs, such as libraries and other dependencies, and ship it all out as one package.

data.title: Astro
data.description: Astro is a meta-framework focused on delivering heavy painted content. Astro is framework agnostic, meaning you can use it with any framework you want. Some benchmark show that Astro is performant and very SEO friendly. Google, Microsoft, Porsche, NordVPN, TheGuardian and many others are already using Astro.
